text: Hi <@U01ARC0R0PN>, You have to provide minimum 5 pre-designed sections in theme, so client can use that, for more information about sections you can go with this link : <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-areas/sections>
Just want to report possible bug in the theme validation and module publishing side of things.
